key.name: address-formatting
key.description: Whether addresses should be formatted according to standard in their destination country

key.name: completion-minimum-query-length
key.description: The number of characters that must be typed before Evolution will attempt to autocomplete.

key.name: completion-show-address
key.summary: Show autocompleted name with an address
key.description: Whether force showing the mail address with the name of the autocompleted contact in the entry.

key.name: select-names-last-used-uri
key.summary: URI for the folder last used in the select names dialog
key.description: URI for the folder last used in the select names dialog.

key.name: layout
key.description: The layout style determines where to place the preview pane in relation to the contact list. "0" (Classic View) places the preview pane below the contact list. "1" (Vertical View) places the preview pane next to the contact list.

key.name: hpane-position
key.description: Position of the contact preview pane when oriented horizontally.

key.name: vpane-position
key.description: Position of the contact preview pane when oriented vertically.

key.name: preview-show-maps
key.description: Whether to show maps in preview pane

key.name: primary-addressbook
key.description: The UID of the selected (or "primary") address book in the sidebar of the "Contacts" view

key.name: show-preview
key.description: Whether to show the preview pane.
